title: New: An Blonds – Creeps Into
content: Since Introducing Manchester’s An Blonds a little under two weeks ago, I’ve yet to unearth any more significant details about the elusive group, aside from the fact that one or more of the members have been interviewed on CitR under a previous guise. New cut Creeps Into may well be their best yet, with it’s Toro y Moi synths and endearing vocal sections. It’s slightly introvert, psychedelic pop at it’s utmost enjoyable, complete with tinkling hooks and addictive harmonies. Check out Creeps Into below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
